name: Boomerang (Am Adem)
description:
Throw and run, and keep running because you forgot how to catch. Try to survive the horde of enemies and defeat them with your not so trusty boomerang which is just as dangerous.

This is my first game. All programming and sound effects were created by me, art was provided by my friend. Music sources below.

Title music:

Music: Chipper Doodle v2 by Kevin MacLeod Free download: https://filmmusic.io/song/3500-chipper-doodle-v2 License (CC BY 4.0): https://filmmusic.io/standard-license Artist website: https://incompetech.com/

Game music:

The following music was used for this media project: Music: Bit Shift by Kevin MacLeod Free download: https://filmmusic.io/song/3439-bit-shift License (CC BY 4.0): https://filmmusic.io/standard-license Artist website: https://incompetech.com/
